secret_rule: The item can be brought to the picnic only if its name is an anagram of a type of flower, it has a greater number of vowels than consonants, its last letter is a consonant, and it is generally used or consumed outdoors. The item should also have a name that, when split into individual words, each word starts with a letter found in the word 'picnic.'
